Keywords: Avengers , Celebrity , Robot
Real Name: Vision
Special Powers
BECAUSE IT CAN'T ALL BE SORROW, CAN IT?: POWER: If no other friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Vision or damaged another friendly character since your last turn. Place Vision such that he can make a close attack targeting the chosen character, then do so. // If the opposing character damaged another friendly character with the Celebrity keyword, this trait is activated as FREE instead.
ARE YOU FAMILIAR WITH THE SHIP OF THESEUS?: Phasing/Teleport, Super Senses. // Friendly characters automatically break away from characters that Vision hit this turn.
BUT WHAT IS GRIEF, IF NOT LOVE PERSEVERING?: STOP. Shape Change, Support. // FREE: KO Vision. If you do, choose a friendly character and roll a d6. Heal the chosen character equal to the result.
Trade Vision Want Vision

Comments
June 13, 2022
Oathful
Having the infamous trifecta of defensive powers (Shape Change, Super Senses, and Impervious) gives him good defense, but with how prevalent penetrating damage is now, that Impervious feels a little less powerful than I'd like. When it does work though, he is near untouchable. Other than that, while you get a lot of value at his 100pt line, his 50pt line feels more like a glorified retaliator piece when I could just play Tri-Sentinel or Master Mold for less points. Despite all of that he does make for a good primary/secondary attacker with a long dial and good defensive capabilities at that higher point value. I do wish his traits had a bit more synergy with his top dial, but that's me being nitpicky. Thematic: 9.5/10 Viability: 7.5/10 (100pt), 6/10 (50pt) Fun Factor: 8/10, fairly balanced figure
June 9, 2022
OsArkady
JLU046e Martian Manhunter has the SC/SS/Impervious trifecta as well.
June 9, 2022
Pseudokinetic
100pt cyborg spider-man had the trifecta. not recalling any others off the top of my head.
June 6, 2022
Disasstah
[QUOTE=DarkTortoise23;12191695]This mans has the legendary triple rollout of shape change, super senses and impervious on top of a retaliation effect and 7 range penetrating with IT hindering....you love to see it. I've been waiting for a crazy strong version of vision like this![/QUOTE] That good sir is the trifecta. I think he might be the only character ever with all 3 built in, minus any pick a power characters.
May 7, 2022
Goop
This is another good solid range attacker that is rocking some solid defense with mystics/SS and SC. A free attack on a celebrity team is also a great bonus.
April 9, 2022
reanimationguy
It feels so good to finally have a Vision who is both playable and in his weight class. The SF Vision from ADW is still a pretty decent 50 points, but none of the 100 point Visions we’ve had have hit the mark like this one.
